subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The decisive goal in the Netherlands’ victory over Mexico was set up by Arjen Robben’s fall — some might say dive — under a challenge from Mexico’s captain, Rafael Márquez. Klaas-Jan Huntelaar scored on the penalty kick.
snippet: The decisive goal in the Netherlands’ victory over Mexico was set up by Arjen Robben’s fall — some might say dive — under a challenge from Mexico’s captain, Rafael Márquez. Klaas-Jan Huntelaar scored on the penalty kick.
